content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Apr 2019Which is the best telecommunication company for a 2-year contract plan?Currently, I am under Starhub previous plan of XS, student version so, it is a 3GB + 1GB at $48. Now, my plan has reached the end of the contract plan and I have to re-contract to the new plan, how I sitting on the fence, whether to stick to Starhub or change to Signtel. I have 6 plans under my name, all are due for re-contraction at different timing. I have a 30% discount as a hub club member. Does anyone of you have a comparison of both 2-year plan and sim only plan for Starhub and Signtel?1 answerAnswerBump0

TWTay WenHaoLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 14 Apr 2019I will recommend to continue with starhub since they recently revamped their plans. Now the plans comes with alot more data and its cheaper. With your hub club discount it should be more worth it0 comments0
